code: @BeforeClass public static void initializePortNum() {     portNum = AvailablePortFinder.getNextAvailable().     System.setProperty("test.port", "" + portNum). }

@Test public void testRestletPojoInOut() throws Exception {     String body = "{\"id\": 123, \"name\": \"Donald Duck\"}".     String out = template.requestBody("http://localhost:" + portNum + "/users/lives", body, String.class).     assertNotNull(out).     assertEquals("{\"iso\":\"EN\",\"country\":\"England\"}", out). }
